name: Gilliam_Select_Tutorial
_source: speak;Anna;There are weapons in FE8R that are considered <red>Heavy Weapons</>.|There are four types of heavy weapons, <red>Blades</>, <red>Greatlances</>, <red>Warhammers</>, and <red>Greatbows</>.|They are very strong, but the enemy will always attack first when using them, and you <red>normally</> cannot multi-attack with them.|Certain skills will allow them to multi-attack, though.|They will also knock back the enemy one space after they are hit.|Certain unit types also gain special skills while using certain heavy weapons!|Blades allow <red>Infantry</><icon>Infantry</> or <red>Armored units</><icon>Armor</> to <red>Cleave</> while attacking when at Max HP!|This will hit all enemies around them with increased damage!|This enemy right here has a blade, so he will attack all around him on Enemy Phase.|Be careful!;;;;6

speak;Anna;Gilliam also has a blade as a personal weapon so take advantage of that!|Greatlances allow <red>Armored</><icon>Armor</> and <red>Horse units</><icon>Horse</> to counterattack an additional 2 spaces away when defending while above 75% max HP!|Gilliam's other personal lance is a greatlance, so Gilliam is a great unit to test heavy weapons!|Warhammers allow <red>Pirate or Brigand</><icon>Pirate</> and <red>Dragon units</><icon>Dragon</> to deal 20% Max HP damage and <red>Stun</><icon>Stun</> to enemies around the target!|These are powerful effects, but be careful since these can be used against you as well!|Last thing to note is that heavy weapons can deal effective damage against <red>Frozen</><icon>Frozen</> units, so try to combo those together!|Alright, now go deal some massive damage!;;;;6
